details.title: Token Distribution
details.description-1: “If only I had noticed it earlier and invested just 46 dollars of my spare money, I would be a millionaire by now” - your wishes have been answered! The token has been created by the very same enthusiasts that missed their own jump to stardom.
details.description-2: A decentralized community token with one main objective: provide a voice to all participants in the project. Expect an engaged and vibrant eco-system that puts community goodwill to use through humanitarian projects and more!

1.title: Create a MetaMask wallet
1.body: Create a MetaMask Wallet using either a desktop computer or mobile device. That will allow you to buy, sell, send and receive HAS.

3.title: Send MATIC to your wallet
3.body: Send MATIC to your wallet. You can buy MATIC directly on MetaMask, or through exchanges like Coinbase, Crypto.com, KuCoin, Binance, etc. And then send them to your MetaMask wallet.

4.title: Connect your wallet to QuickSwap
4.body: Access your wallet on QuickSwap by clicking ‘Connect to a wallet’ and then selecting MetaMask.

5.title: Trade MATIC for HAS
5.body: You can start trading as soon as you have MATIC available. Press ‘Select a token’ and enter the token address, or search for it in the token list.

intro.slogan: A decentralized community-based venture token made for future crypto-billionaires. Missed the train on Doge and Shiba - fear not, Hasbik is here!
intro.question: What is HAS?

1.title: Phase 1
1.description: The very first phase is all about covering our technical bases, developing the fundamentals and really connecting with the community.

1.title: Deploy Hasbik to Polygon network
1.description: Released on November 14, 2021. With a limited supply of 1 billion tokens, Hasbik is a community based social token.

2.title: Community building
2.description: The biggest and most important block in our chain is you – the community.

3.title: Lock initial liquidity
3.description: LP tokens to withdraw the funds from the liquidity pool are burned.

2.title: Phase 2
2.description: In the second phase we will dedicate our energy towards two objectives: entrenching our position on the market and developing our humanitarian program in collaboration with the community.

3.title: Phase 3
3.description: The final step is executing the humanitarian programs designed by the community through the decentralized governance platform we will be using for the decision making.
